data.name: YourStory
data.value: Tell a little about your story

data.name: PaperText
data.value: We recycle 1/3 of the paper produced, 1 ton recycled saves 22 sheets, avoid wetting, tearing or wrinkling do not mix embossed paper wash long life rinsing dishes.

data.name: AluminumSubTitle
data.value: In 60 days, 1 can is produced, purchased, collected and recycled and returns to the shelves

data.name: AluminumText
data.value: We recycle 98.4% of cans in Brazil, and only 33% of other aluminum items to recycle spend 95% less energy than producing it

data.name: PlasticSubTitle
data.value: Brazil only recycles 20% of production 8 billion kg / year pollute the oceans

data.name: PlasticText
data.value: Recycle bags, snacks, sachets, straws, Styrofoam and all other platicos clean food scraps with rinsing water or used napkin.

data.name: OilSubTitle
data.value: 1 liter down the drain = 25 thousand liters of polluted water

data.name: OilText
data.value: In a discard in the sink or in the pot after being used and cooled, the oil should be strained into a PET bottle with a lid, ask the collector to take it to a collection point or cooperative that produces soap.

data.name: DiverseSubTitle
data.value: It is the worst metarial for waste pickers, its value is very low

data.name: DiverseText
data.value: Brazil loses R $ 8 billion / year introducing medicines and mixed recyclable medicines and its laminated packaging must be discarded in pharmacies.

data.name: MetalSubTitle
data.value: Steel is the most recycled material in the world, it is 100% recyclable, it can be recycled endlessly

data.name: MetalText
data.value: 1/4 of the steel in Brazil uses recycled material, recycled metals are in food cans, tools, wires, beams, automobiles and household items.

data.name: TreePruningSubTitle
data.value: Tree pruning can be composted and produce energy

data.name: TreePruningText
data.value: At events and parties, organize a selection of dry recyclables in large bags evaluate and arrange with the collector the collection of waste not listed in this application.

data.name: FurnitureText
data.value: Combine with the picker the point of disposal of the furniture, ensure that the furniture will not end in a vacant lot or on the street.

data.name: ElectronicsSubTitle
data.value: 98% of electronic components can be recycled

data.name: ElectronicsText
data.value: It has a higher value, but only 15.5% is recycled, there is a lack of infrastructure in Brazil, they are highly contaminants, seek the correct destination.

data.name: RubbleSubTitle
data.value: You can use 95% of the material and recycling is mandatory

data.name: RubbleText
data.value: Reused in streets and highways ensure that your rubbish does not end up in a vacant lot check with your city hall for the appropriate location.

data.name: GlassSubTitle
data.value: 100% recyclable and lasts forever low price, few places recycle

data.name: GlassText
data.value: Broken glass is even worse, greater number of accidents with lamps, TVs and mirrors need special attention.

data.name: BatteryText
data.value: They are on cell phones, cordless phones, cameras, camcorders, laptops, toys and watches, they cannot be mixed apart and notify the collector before collection.
